message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.junit.Assert.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.mockito.Mockito.*.
Redundant import from the same package - org.apache.hadoop.yarn.webapp.hamlet.Hamlet.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.hadoop.yarn.webapp.hamlet.HamletSpec.*.
